string.value: At #b#m250000000##k, there is an instrcutor that trains the Masters, an instructor by the name of #b#p2091000##k. Maybe I can become a Master myself if I train with him.
Without any explanation, #p2091000# ordered to me to take on #r10 #o5120503#s#k. \n\n#o5120503# #r#a38001##k
Even though I was successful in taking on all the #o5120503#s, #p2091000# didn't compliment my work one bit. What is he? Is he really going to help me become the Master?
선인에게 가장 중요한 덕목은 무엇보다 끈기지. 끈기가 없는 사람은 절대 선인이 될 수 없어. 그러니 다들 끈기있게 노력하게! …그런데 자넨 누구지?\r\n#L0# #b당신이 #p2091000#이신가요?
수련장에는 무슨 볼 일이지? 수련을 방해하는 것은 용서 못 한다.\r\n#L0# #b선인이 되고 싶어서 찾아왔습니다.
선인이 되고 싶어하는 사람처럼 보이지는 않는데. 진심인가? 믿어지지 않는구만. 정말 선인이 되고 싶다는 거지?
선인이 될 생각이 없다면 뭐하러 여기 온 거야? 훈련을 방해하지 말라구.

The most important quality of a Master is persistence. Persistence is a must if you desire to become the Master. I need each and every one of you to strive towards becoming the Master with persistence, okay? By the way ... who are you?\r\n#L0# #bAre you #p2091000#?
What can I do for you here in this training ground? I do not tolerate anyone interrupting the training.\r\n#L0# #bI am here because I want to become the Master.
You ... don't look like someone that wants to become the Master. Are you sure? I don't believe this. You really want to become the Master?
Then get in the training ground and defeat #r10 #o5120503#s#k right now.
If you do not desire to become the Master, then what are you doing here? I despise anyone that interrupts my training without any reason.
Well, anyone can do that! You can't call yourself the Master just by doing that.
You can't even get #r10 #o5120503#s#k... you are weak. You need persistence and desire along with talent to become a master.
